cu.explanation_en: Setting the ASN.1 verbosity to an invalid enum 'invalid' will cause configuration parsing errors and prevent the CU from starting properly.

du.explanation_en: Setting the global log level to an invalid enum 'error' will cause logging configuration errors and potentially crash the DU during initialization.
du.explanation_zh: 將全域日誌級別設定為無效的枚舉值 'error'，會導致日誌配置錯誤，並可能在 DU 初始化期間崩潰。
